Posts.Content: lymph nodes of the axillary region drain the upper limb area and then eventually drain into the nodes of the neck. it may b because of some infection in the upper limb which may hav travelled or as in case of my grandfather, he had a non Hodgkins lymphoma. u should definitely go to your doctor to rule out anything serious. do let us know about the progress. best of luck
